description:
Gintoki and Hijikata try everything they can to split Otae and Dozaemon-san up, but there are some other switcheroos happening behind the scenes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`m Odd Jobs, and He`s Shinsengumi
J`appartiens à l`Agence, lui au Shinsengumi
Ore ga Yorozuya de, Aitsu ga Shinsengumi de
おれが万事屋で あいつが真選組で
